attributes.action: To put all children in education back a year as they are the ones suffering.
attributes.additional_details: Government need to take a stand on this protect the future. Let’s please not let the children down and help them have the chance to build a brighter future. Without the pressure of our kids having to go back to quick whilst we are still at war with this disease and the children are the ones ending up paying the price for our mistakes.
attributes.background: It is not fair on teachers and most importantly kids they are the future generation and are going to suffer the most with there loss of education. And if this was to happen it means the government would not be under enormous pressure to have schools reopen when we are still in the danger zone.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

All pupils to repeat this current academic year.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566160
